scripts.build: node setup.js && node netlify-prebuild.js && node setup-nextjs.js && node -e "console.log('üöÄ Starting Prisma client generation...'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); try { execSync('npx prisma generate', { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('‚úÖ Prisma client generated successfully'); } catch (error) { console.error('‚ùå Error generating Prisma client:', error.message); process.exit(1); }" && next build
scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { require('./prisma/generate-client.js') } catch(e) { console.log('Falling back to direct generation'); try { require('@prisma/client'); } catch(e) { console.log('Continuing anyway'); } }"
scripts.prepare-vercel: node -e "try { require('./scripts/prepare-vercel.js') } catch(e) { console.log('Skipping prepare-vercel.js: ' + e.message); }"
scripts.vercel-build: npm run prepare-vercel && node -e "try { require('./scripts/vercel-deploy.js') } catch(e) { console.log('Skipping vercel-deploy.js: ' + e.message); }" && node -e "try { require('./scripts/vercel-build-info.js') } catch(e) { console.log('Skipping vercel-build-info.js: ' + e.message); }" && npx prisma generate && next build
